title: Details
content:
Details # Details shortcode is a helper for details html5 element. It is going to replace expand shortcode.
Example # {{% details "Title" [open] %}} ## Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne... {{% /details %}} {{% details title="Title" open=true %}} ## Markdown content Lorem markdownum insigne... {{% /details %}} Markdown content # Lorem markdownum insigne…
